text.text_translated:
You have dreams about a phone call from an old friend.
You have dreams about the death of someone close.
These dreams happen by chance more often than they are prophecies.
A prophecy is a special guess about the future.
We probably choose to forget all the times we dream about these things, but they do not happen.
